about.description:
HepMC3 is a new rewrite of HepMC event record. It uses shared pointers
for in-memory navigation and the POD concept for the persistency.
about.summary: HepMC3 is a new rewrite of HepMC event record.

name: hepmc3

about.description:
HepMC3 is a new rewrite of HepMC event record. It uses shared pointers
for in-memory navigation and the POD concept for the persistency.
about.summary: HepMC3 is a new rewrite of HepMC event record.

about.description:
HepMC3 is a new rewrite of HepMC event record. It uses shared pointers
for in-memory navigation and the POD concept for the persistency.
about.summary: HepMC3 is a new rewrite of HepMC event record.

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: HepMC3
  version: 3.3.1

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://hepmc.web.cern.ch/hepmc/releases/${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 08240160b0f28dc3293aa4d61ce65e2d67cd597acf6faca439f2e46625f7e793
  target_directory: source

build:
  number: 3
  skip: win

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
    - make
  host:
    - python
    - zlib
    - bzip2
    - zstd
  run:
    - python

tests:
  - files:
      source:
        - source/test
    requirements:
      run:
        - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
        - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - ${{ compiler('fortran') }}
    script:
      - HepMC3-config --prefix
      - HepMC3-config --cxxflags
      - HepMC3-config --ldflags
      - HepMC3-config --libdir
      - cd source/test
      - "${CXX} -std=c++11 testMass.cc -o testMass $(HepMC3-config --cxxflags --ldflags) -Wl,-rpath,\"$(HepMC3-config --libdir)\""
      - ./testMass

about:
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_file: source/COPYING
  summary: HepMC3 is a new rewrite of HepMC event record.
  description: |
    HepMC3 is a new rewrite of HepMC event record. It uses shared pointers
    for in-memory navigation and the POD concept for the persistency.
  homepage: https://hepmc.web.cern.ch/hepmc/
  repository: https://gitlab.cern.ch/hepmc/HepMC3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - henryiii
    - chrisburr
    - gartung
    - matthewfeickert
    - kratsg
    - lgray
    - meiyasan
    - scarlehoff
